plot: Set in the distant future, religion once again has a grip on the world. A group of church crusaders stumble a piece of outlawed arcane technology and begin to question the church.
title: Anno Domini 3048
plot_es: Set in the distant future, religion once again has a grip on the world. A group of church crusaders stumble a piece of outlawed arcane technology and begin to question the church.
plot_en: Set in the distant future, religion once again has a grip on the world. A group of church crusaders stumble a piece of outlawed arcane technology and begin to question the church.
